headline: 3 Reasons AVY is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Avery Dennison’s stock price fell to $166.80. Shareholders have lost 8% of their capital, which is disappointing considering the S&P 500 has climbed by 11.6%. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and might have investors contemplating their next move.
